mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONCENTRATION(id, concentrator, node, lan_id, communication_net, address, confirmation_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{concentrator}, #{node}, #{lanId}, #{communicationNet}, #{address}, #{confirmationTime})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONCENTRATION WHERE concentrator = #{0} AND node = #{1}
